flatirons.quote: the dropdown in the terminal that says "1: powershell"
flatirons.comment: Change to: the "+" dropdown in the terminal next to "powershell"

Add: Note, you can paste into Ubuntu using Ctrl+Shift+V, but you may need to enable the option in Properties, which is accessible by right clicking the top menu bar of the Ubuntu appliaction (https://stackoverflow.com/questions/38832230/copy-paste-in-bash-on-ubuntu-on-windows/50050642#50050642)

Add: Note, this step can take several minutes, though it may appear "stuck" on the line containing "Installing darkfish documentation for rubygems-update".  After the installation is successful, if you cannot type the next step, close and reopen Ubuntu.
Change to: Type "My PC" ||| (Or is this a joke??? Does it later get mentioned in the class on Recursion? If so you can take that joke to the bank and deposit it into the ATM Machine.)
